rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalistic Scandinavian style foyer with natural lighting and clean lines.

rooms.name: Living Room / Studio Area
rooms.description: Open space that serves as living area, kitchenette, and workspace, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance with prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional Scandinavian kitchen featuring modern appliances, open-plan design and natural materials for enhanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact bathroom with efficient fixtures, ensuring privacy and proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Service Quarters (Servants' Quarters)
rooms.description: Small, efficient living area for the domestic help with essentials, maintaining minimalistic aesthetics and practical design.

openings.description: Large door opening with Scandinavian simplicity, placed in a favorable Vastu direction to welcome positive energy.
Multiple window openings ensuring ample natural light and ventilation; north-facing windows for calm and east-facing for vitality.
Access door to the private gym area designed with sleek, functional lines.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated space for physical fitness, designed with Scandinavian simplicity and functional equipment layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, aligned in a Vastu favorable direction.

openings.description: Spiral or straight staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed with safety and minimalistic aesthetics.
Balcony for the master bedroom, providing natural ventilation and outdoor view in alignment with Vastu principles.
